page.title: 05FARM VISITS
page.content: {FARM VISITS.}We found over 20 farms listed in our area and we wrote to them. We found that some farms had sold their land to other farmers and were now just homes. Most farmers replied to our questionnaire and children visited the farm. Here are some details from the replies. {PIGEON HOUSE FARM}132acres, 17pasture, 115arable,21largest.{CROPS}wheat, potato,beet,grass.100ewes,3clves. {Farmer HARRY CARTER}47 manages on own on farm since age 14{Machinery {tractors,}drill, sprayer, combine, plough, fertiliser, baler. County Best Farm award '69 and 83. Bldgs 200 years.{FIDDLERS GREEN FARM. }3acres livery stable and pasture.5horses.Land sold. Originally 90 acre farm. {HAYDEN HILL.}40acres,20past,20arable. {CROPS}potato,barley,47 yearlings. Part of larger farm 200acres, Swindon.
